page.title: 11EVENTS IN WOLSTON
page.content: One of the main events of the year is the{Wolston Gala}held on the last Saturday in June. Usually there is a procession through the village led by Wolston Gala Queen on her float. There are fancy dress competions, displays of expertise, stalls selling home made craft ware and side shows where people can join in the fun and games. The money raised is distributed amongst the various{village charities.}Wolston First School's May Fayre, is also a major event and has similar events to the village gala but the money raised buys items for school. There are also many local fetes and fairs held by other organisations in the community to raise funds for their own charities or just for fun like the annual {Pancake Race}or the men{Morris dancing on the car part of the Red Lion Pub on Whitsuntide Monday.
